course.subject: ENGG
course.name: Robotics Special Project: RoboMasters 2023 Robot Contest
course.description: RoboMasters Robot Contest is a robot competition platform created for young engineers. Participating teams will get out of the classroom and independently develop and manufacture robots for the shooting confrontation. The contest will provide them with an opportunity to obtain precious practical skills and use strategic thinking, combine theories with practice and create advanced smart robots through fierce competition. Each year, new game field, rules of competition (https://www.robomaster.com/en-US/robo/rm) and a new technical challenge are introduced to the competition. Enrollment in the project course requires instructor's approval. May be graded PP.

reviews.title: More you do, more you get
reviews.comment_content:
Project-based learning in a student team called HKUST RoboMaster Team ENTERPRIZE. No instructor, no lab, no tutorial, no exam.
Literally everything about robots:
Mechanical (material, design, manufacture.......) btw, they got many CNC machines, crazy.
Electrical (PCB, chips, soldering......)
Embedded (C++, OOP, Control theory, human interaction.......)
Algorithm (Computer Vision, SLAM, lidar......) yeah they got 3 PRO LIDAR IN THEIR LAB!!!
Operation (Project management, Media, Finance, Outreach......)
reviews.comment_teaching: Self-taught, if you don't ask you will get nothing. Do more, ask more, and then you will learn more.
reviews.comment_grading:
Team members tried their best to get as much A range as possible. There is around 50% - 60% A and around 30% B range. C, D and F were for the people who never showed up.
If you are interested and willing to put time and effort into it, you will definitely get a good grade. If you are an Engineering student, you will most likely get a Robotics Minor because this course will fulfill the requirements.
If you just want a Robotics Minor, RUN!!! You will be pushed regularly and you won't have any energy to finish anything. Both you and the other members won't have any good time.
reviews.comment_workload: More like a 40-cre course, if you are responsible.

reviews.author: jack1207
reviews.title: Dont join
reviews.comment_content:
U will learn many thing in comp,elec,mech.
Indeed, you will learn many things, but you shouldnt join the team because they are mean and gives bad grade.
reviews.comment_teaching:
Instructors never appear.
Seniors are willing to teach but are racists towards those that dont speak mandarian
reviews.comment_workload:
Too much thing to do.
If you dont do their work.
It is like you own them.
You need to do powerpoint, make robots, and meet attendance and filll in a peers-evualation form that is fully biased
